column4: the stuff I read is generally from people who have only ever used ubuntu, you can tell to when that is the case, I wouldn't give it to much credibility
were you talking about freespire or ubuntu when you said that?
i was talking about the click and run program installer offered by linspire/freespire, which are distro's supposedly based on ubuntu, and that click and run (cnr) is what i was talking about
